channel.title: rpm on Sparking Mind
channel.description: Recent content in rpm on Sparking Mind

item.title: rpm and yum cheatsheet
item.description: query the dependency of a package rpm -qR <package-name> query the dependency of a rpm file rpm -qpR <rpm-file> query which rpm this file belongs to rpm -qif <filename> query non-installed rpm file rpm -qip <rpm-file> setup yum with proxy append proxy=<your proxy> to /etc/yum.conf [main] proxy=<your proxy> if you don’t want proxy in some repository append proxy=_none_ to your repo file
